multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; high US rates and Fed policy pressure on the pharma sector, driving equity outflows and tightening yields.

category.motivation: The article reports President Trump's announcement of a tariff policy, which is an official statement from a policymaker.

impact.motivation: The article reports a significant tariff threat to the pharma sector, directly affecting major pharma stocks and margins.

time_frame.motivation: The article focuses on an immediate policy announcement that directly impacts pharma stocks and sector sentiment.

article_node.title: President Trump Is Targeting Big Pharma With Tariffs
article_node.summary: President Trump announced plans to impose up to 250% tariffs on imported pharmaceuticals, raising uncertainty for the pharma sector. The move has already weighed on pharma stocks, with major names like Novo Nordisk, Pfizer, and Eli Lilly falling below the S&P 500. High U.S. interest rates and a shift of passive flows away from defensive sectors add to the pressure on the industry. The tariff threat could further erode margins and investment appetite for big pharma.
